snippet.title: Hiro Mashima x Indie game project  FAIRY TAIL INDIE GAME GUILD Officially begins!
snippet.description:
FAIRY TAIL: DUNGEONS to be Released on Steam on August 26, 2024
　Steam Link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2305500/
FAIRY TAIL: Beach Volleyball Havoc to be Released on Steam on September 16, 2024
　Steam Link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2116680/ 


【About the Hiro Mashima × Indie Game Project collaboration “FAIRY TAIL INDIE GAME GUILD”】
This indie game project began when FAIRY TAIL author Hiro Mashima said he wanted to have a FAIRY TAIL game made. 

The creators are making these games starting with their love of FAIRY TAIL, as well as their own strengths and sensibilities. 
These will be games that both FAIRY TAIL fans and all gamers will enjoy.



－－－－－－－－－－
Title: FAIRY TAIL: DUNGEONS
Platform: Steam
Steam Link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2305500/ 
Languages: Japanese, English, Chinese (Traditional and Simplified), French, Korean, Thai
Genre: deck building roguelite
Planned Launch Date: Tuesday, August 26, 2024
Suggested Retail Price: Unconfirmed
Players: 1
Developer: ginolabo
Publisher: Kodansha
Copyright: ©Hiro Mashima, Kodansha/ginolabo

Title: FAIRY TAIL: Beach Volleyball Havoc
Platform: Steam
Steam Link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2116680/ 
Languages: Japanese, English, Chinese (Traditional and Simplified), French, Korean, Thai
Genre: Magic beach volleyball battle game
Planned Launch Date: Tuesday, September 16, 2024
Suggested Retail Price: Unconfirmed
Players: 1-4
Developer: tiny cactus studio, MASUDATARO, veryOK
Publisher: Kodansha
Copyright: ©Hiro Mashima, Kodansha/tiny cactus studio/MASUDATARO/veryOK
